author: Vithushan Ehantharajah, Vithushan Ehantharajah
title: Adil Rashid resisting Test return as England bowler takes to driveway cricket to stay sharp during lockdown
description: The spinner is focused on regaining full fitness following a shoulder injury
content: Familiar surroundings are helping Adil Rashid cope with the tedium of lockdown. But while being limited to the family home in Heaton, Bradford, sees the leg spinner revisiting the street and driveways where his cricket began, he has not revisited his decision… [+5974 chars]
